name: undici
description: - A HTTP 1.1 client   - Keep alive by default   - LIFO scheduling   - No pipelining   - Unlimited connections   - Can follow redirects - Re-invents HTTP primitives and relies directly on `SOCKETS` - Comes with its own built-in mocks - **Comment**: Weird work on naming   - HTTP 1.1 -> 11 -> UNDICI
